doc.field: Brooklyn Bureau of Permits transit receipts
Brooklyn Bureau of Permits transit receipts

One bound volume containing 1890 transit receipts for the Brooklyn Bureau of Permits for moving and transporting corpses. The records themselves contain the name, age, cause of death, and cemetery name for each body transported.

One bound volume containing 1890 transit receipts for the Brooklyn Bureau of Permits for moving and transporting corpses. The records themselves contain the name, age, cause of death, and cemetery name for each body transported.

One bound volume containing transit receipts, dated 1890, for the Brooklyn Bureau of Permits for moving and transporting corpses. The records themselves contain the name, age, cause of death, and cemetery name for each body transported.
Source and date of acquisition unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1978.
